22-1175.summary: Recommendation to receive and file notice of adjournment of the September 13, 2022 regular meeting of the Housing Authority of the City of Long Beach, California.Page 1 of 4411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 4:30 PMTUESDAY, OCTOBER 11, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHHOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF LONG BEACH, CALIFORNIA MINUTESA motion was made by Vice Chair Saro, seconded by Commissioner Austin, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 8 - Allen, Supernaw, Mungo, Austin, Richardson, Tanzer, Saro and ZendejasAbsent: 2 - Price and Uranga2.

22-1168.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Housing Authority of the City of Long Beach, California Regular Meeting held Tuesday, August 9, 2022.A motion was made by Commissioner Allen, seconded by Commissioner Supernaw, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 8 - Allen, Supernaw, Mungo, Austin, Richardson, Tanzer, Saro and ZendejasAbsent: 2 - Price and Uranga3.

22-1169.summary: Recommendation to receive and file the Housing Authority Financial and Operational Performance Reports for June 2022.  (Citywide)A motion was made by Commissioner Supernaw, seconded by Commissioner Allen, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 8 - Allen, Supernaw, Mungo, Austin, Richardson, Tanzer, Saro and ZendejasAbsent: 2 - Price and Uranga4.

OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 4:30 PMTUESDAY, OCTOBER 11, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHHOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF LONG BEACH, CALIFORNIA MINUTESA motion was made by Commissioner Austin, seconded by Commissioner Mungo, to approve recommendation. 22-1171.summary: Recommendation to authorize Executive Director, or designee, to release a Request for Proposals (RFP) advertising the availability of Project-Based Vouchers (PBV) and solicit participation in the program from interested property owners of affordable units; and, authorize Executive Director, or designee, to negotiate and execute agreement(s) to enter into Housing Assistance Payment contract(s) for PBV assistance in accordance with Housing and Urban Development (HUD) guidelines for qualified proposals submitted in response to this RFP and approved by HUD.  (Citywide)Councilwoman Mungo spoke.Alison King, Deputy Executive Director/Bureau Manager, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Councilwoman Mungo and Alison King, Deputy Executive Director/Bureau Manager.Chair Zendejas spoke.A motion was made by Vice Chair Saro, seconded by Commissioner Mungo, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 8 - Allen, Supernaw, Mungo, Austin, Richardson, Tanzer, Saro and ZendejasAbsent: 2 - Price and Uranga6.
